##### <a name="-homeassistant--location_name"></a>`location_name`

Data type: `String`



##### <a name="-homeassistant--latitude"></a>`latitude`

Data type: `Numeric`



##### <a name="-homeassistant--longitude"></a>`longitude`

Data type: `Numeric`



##### <a name="-homeassistant--elevation"></a>`elevation`

Data type: `Numeric`



##### <a name="-homeassistant--unit_system"></a>`unit_system`

Data type: `Enum['imperial', 'metric']`



##### <a name="-homeassistant--time_zone"></a>`time_zone`

Data type: `String`



##### <a name="-homeassistant--known_devices"></a>`known_devices`

Data type: `Optional[Hash]`



Default value: `undef`

##### <a name="-homeassistant--home"></a>`home`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `'/srv/homeassistant'`

##### <a name="-homeassistant--confdir"></a>`confdir`

Data type: `Stdlib::Absolutepath`



Default value: `$facts['os']['name'] ? {'Archlinux' => '/var/lib/hass', default => '/etc/homeassistant'`

##### <a name="-homeassistant--known_devices_replace"></a>`known_devices_replace`

Data type: `Boolean`



Default value: `false`

##### <a name="-homeassistant--install_method"></a>`install_method`

Data type: `Enum['source', 'package']`



Default value: `$facts['os']['name'] ? {'Archlinux' => 'package', default => 'source'`

##### <a name="-homeassistant--service_name"></a>`service_name`

Data type: `String`



Default value: `$facts['os']['name'] ? {'Archlinux' => 'home-assistant', default => 'homeassistant'`

##### <a name="-homeassistant--user"></a>`user`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `$facts['os']['name'] ? {'Archlinux' => 'hass', default => 'homeassistant'`

##### <a name="-homeassistant--group"></a>`group`

Data type: `String[1]`



Default value: `$user`
